mapper.insert: insert into SOILDATA (STATIONID, DATATIME, VOLTAGE, VOLTAGE10, MOISTURE10, VOLTAGE20, MOISTURE20, VOLTAGE30, MOISTRUE30, VOLTAGE40, MOISTRUE40, VOLTAGE60, MOISTRUE60, TRANSTYPE, MESSAGETYPE, RECVDATATIME, `STATE`) values (#{stationid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{datatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{voltage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voltage10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moisture10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voltage20,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moisture20,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voltage30,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moistrue30,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voltage40,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moistrue40,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{voltage60,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{moistrue60,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{messagetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recvdatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SOILDATA
STATIONID,
DATATIME,
VOLTAGE,
VOLTAGE10,
MOISTURE10,
VOLTAGE20,
MOISTURE20,
VOLTAGE30,
MOISTRUE30,
VOLTAGE40,
MOISTRUE40,
VOLTAGE60,
MOISTRUE60,
TRANSTYPE,
MESSAGETYPE,
RECVDATATIME,
`STATE`,
#{stationid,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{datatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{voltage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{voltage10,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{moisture10,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{voltage20,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{moisture20,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{voltage30,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{moistrue30,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{voltage40,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{moistrue40,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{voltage60,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{moistrue60,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{transtype,jdbcType=CHAR},

#{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

insert into SOILDATA (STATIONID,DATATIME,VOLTAGE,VOLTAGE10,MOISTURE10,VOLTAGE20,MOISTURE20, VOLTAGE30,MOISTURE30,VOLTAGE40,MOISTURE40,VOLTAGE60,MOISTURE60,TRANSTYPE,MESSAGETYPE,RECVDATATIME,STATE)
( select #{item.stationid}, to_date(#{item.datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{item.voltage}, #{item.voltage10}, #{item.moisture10}, #{item.voltage20}, #{item.moisture30}, #{item.voltage30}, #{item.moisture30}, #{item.voltage40}, #{item.moisture40}, #{item.voltage60}, #{item.moisture60}, #{item.transtype}, #{item.messagetype}, to_date(#{item.recvdatatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #{item.state} from dual )
mapper.update:
begin
update SOILDATA
VOLTAGE = #{item.voltage},
VOLTAGE10 = #{item.voltage10},
MOISTURE10 = #{item.moisture10},
VOLTAGE20 = #{item.voltage20},
MOISTURE20 = #{item.moisture20},
VOLTAGE30 = #{item.voltage30},
MOISTRUE30 = #{item.moisture30},
VOLTAGE40 = #{item.voltage40},
MOISTURE40 = #{item.moisture40},
VOLTAGE60 = #{item.voltage60},
MOISTURE60 = #{item.moisture60},
TRANSTYPE = #{item.transtype},
MESSAGETYPE = #{item.messagetype},
RECVDATATIME = to_date(#{item.recvdatatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),
STATE = #{item.state}
where STATIONID=#{item.stationid} AND DATATIME = to_date(#{item.datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
;end;
mapper.select:
select t.STATIONID, t.DATATIME, t.VOLTAGE, t.VOLTAGE10, t.MOISTURE10, t.VOLTAGE20, t.MOISTURE20, t.VOLTAGE30, t.MOISTURE30, t.VOLTAGE40, t.MOISTURE40, t.VOLTAGE60, t.MOISTURE60, t.TRANSTYPE, t.MESSAGETYPE, t.RECVDATATIME, t.STATE from SOILDATA t where 1=1
and STATIONID = #{stationid}
and DATATIME = to_date(#{datatime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and DATATIME >= to_date(#{strttime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
and to_date(#{endtime},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') >= DATATIME
order by t.STATIONID
